DOC.criteria: The following main inclusion criterion subject : 1 . Males females age > 18 year 2 . Informed consent 3 . Subjects chronic medical condition hypertension diabetes consider stable principal investigator 4 . Women postmenopausal surgically sterile 5 . Able return study assessment In addition , follow main inclusion criterion apply subject suspect prosthetic joint infection : 1 . Operative intervention plan 30 day follow study enrollment 2 . Prosthetic joint implant site 3 month prior enrollment The following main exclusion criterion subject : 1 . Unable comply study requirement 2 . Indication opinion principal investigator surgery within 48 hour presentation . 3 . Receipt antibiotic therapy 2 week precede image 4 . Immunosuppression , e.g. , human immunodeficiency virus ( HIV ) infection , s/p organ transplantation , receipt steroid > 10 day > 10 mg prednisone equivalent daily within 90 day prior enrollment 5 . Requirement medication predispose lactic acidosis ( e.g. , metformin , iron , isoniazid salicylate ; see Appendix A ) 6 . Requirement medication potential mitochondrial toxicity , e.g. , nucleoside analogue ( zidovudine , didanosine , stavudine ) 7 . History inherited mitochondrial disorder ( e.g. , Leber 's hereditary neuropathy , neuropathy , ataxia , retinitis pigmentosa ptosis [ NARP ] , myoneurogenic gastrointestinal encephalopathy [ MNGIE ] , myoclonic epilepsy rag red fiber [ MERFF ] mitochondrial myopathy , encephalomyopathy , lactic acidosis strokelike syndrome [ MELAS ] 8 . Chronic hepatitis B virus ( HBV ) hepatitis C virus ( HCV ) infection 9 . Preexisting myopathy neuropathy 10 . Abnormal liver function test define alanine aminotransferase ( ALT ) > upper limit normal ( ULN ) , aspartate aminotransferase ( AST ) > ULN , gamma glutamyl transferase ( GGT ) > ULN 11 . Alcohol use > 3 unit per day men 2 unit per day woman active intravenous drug use 12 . Creatinine clearance < 30 mL/min 13 . Body mass index > 40 14 . Life expectancy < 6 month 15 .
